ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?
ygData.msgSnippet: Leadership means nothing when the people there don t listen to commands. Maybe Veeshan is the exception in this case, but I have seen the leader of one of our
ygData.messageBody:
Leadership means nothing when the people there don't listen to commands.
Maybe Veeshan is the exception in this case, but I have seen the leader of
one of our most powerful guilds fail on a Vox run due to complete
incompetence of the people there. If people had at all been able to follow
directions, I wouldn't be sitting around with my thumb up my butt waiting
for my guild to get enough resist gear to down Gone. (I have pretty much
everything else done). Bitter?

Elfson Allegro 55 Veeshan
